fields.name: Start Time [YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss]
fields.title: Start time
fields.description: start time of the five-minute averaging period in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: methanesulfonic_acid_concentration [molecules cm^-3]
fields.title: Methanesulfonic acid concentration
fields.description: Gaseous methanesulfonic acid concentration measured with a nitrate chemical ionization APi-HTOF mass spectrometer [molecules per cubic centimetre]

fields.name: flag
fields.title: Flag
fields.description: data quality flag, 1 indicates good data whereas 0 indicates data contaminated by the ship exhaust

fields.name: latitude [deg N]
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: median ship latitude during the five-minute averaging period as measured by the ship's GPS [decimal degrees N]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: median ship latitude during the five-minute averaging period as measured by the ship's GPS

fields.name: longitude [deg E]
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: median ship longitude during the five-minute averaging period as measured by the ship's GPS [decimal degrees E]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: median ship longitude during the five-minute averaging period as measured by the ship's GPS
